Definition: In this task, you're given a text. You must determine if the text is generally about a person. Your answer must be "Yes" or "No". "Yes" means that the text is about a person. "No" means that the text is not about a person. Pay attention that for your answer to be "Yes", the passage should be generally about a person. Mentions of people in the text don't necessarily mean the text is about a person.

Positive Examples.input: Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll.
Positive Examples.explanation: HMS Argyll is a frigate which a warship. Clearly the text is not about a person. Hence, the answer is No.

Positive Examples.input: Text: Alison Bechdel (/ˈbɛkdəl/ BEK-dəl; born September 10 1960) is an American cartoonist. Originally best known for the long-running comic strip Dykes to Watch Out For she came to critical and commercial success in 2006 with her graphic memoir Fun Home.
Positive Examples.explanation: Alison Bechdel is an American cartoonist. Clearly the text is about a person. The answer should be Yes.

Negative Examples.input: Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll.
Negative Examples.explanation: HMS Argyll is a frigate which a warship. Clearly the text is not about a person. Hence, it is an incorrect answer and a negative example.

Negative Examples.input: Text: Alison Bechdel (/ˈbɛkdəl/ BEK-dəl; born September 10 1960) is an American cartoonist. Originally best known for the long-running comic strip Dykes to Watch Out For she came to critical and commercial success in 2006 with her graphic memoir Fun Home.
Negative Examples.explanation: The output is neither "Yes" nor "No". Hence, it is an incorrect answer and a negative example.

Instances.input: Text:  Rufus B. Dodge Jr. (November 24 1861-December 13 1935) was an American lawyer and politician who served as the mayor of Worcester Massachusetts.
Text:  La Coleccion (The Collection in english) is a 2003 album by Master Joe & O.G. Black.
Text:  R2 is a music magazine published bi-monthly in the United Kingdom. It was launched in 1988 as Rock'n'Reel changing its name to R2 in early 2009.
Text:  Cucciolo is the title character of an Italian long-lasting comic book series.
Text:  Krzysztof Andzrej Strugarek (born July 19 1987 in Poznań Poland) is a Polish footballer who plays as a defender for Polonia Bytom. Strugarek competed in the FIFA U-20 World Cup in Canada.

Text:  Valerio Berruti was born in Alba (CN) Italy in 1977. He received a degree in Art Criticism from DAMS in Turin. He currently lives and works in Verduno Italy in a deconsecrated 17th-century church which he bought and restored in 1995.His drawings paintings and sculptures reproduce images essentially of everyday life and family affections.

Text:  Christopher Chris Schultz (born February 16 1960 in Burlington Ontario Canada) is a retired National Football League and Canadian Football League player who played the offensive tackle position primarily with the CFL Toronto Argonauts. Schultz is currently a sportscaster with Canadian sports television channel TSN.

Text:  Volta was a Mogador-class destroyer (French: contre-torpilleur) of the French Navy. Named for the West African river she was built before the outbreak of World War II and was the penultimate contre-torpilleur built by the French Navy. Along with her sister ship Mogador Volta was designed in an effort to build a ship capable of out-fighting every other ship below her tonnage.
